title: Do we have to recite Fatiha behind the Imam, if so, when
transcript: the rahman from the uk he says if the imam is reciting the fatiha can i simply not recite it the answer is yes what about if i want to recite it you can recite it when can i recite it after the imam finishes his fatiha you may recite your fatiha after him saying waladin and if he starts reciting the other surah you can continue reciting it until you conclude it but you must not recite it before him or with him only after he finishes and allah knows best
